attributes.action: Hold an Inquiry into the NI Executives handling of the Covid 19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: It is essential that our Government / devolved administration is held to account.
attributes.background: It is important following the Covid 19 Pandemic that we learn about our successes and failings during the Coronavirus outbreak. It is important not only to hold our public representatives to account but to create a better Pandemic response for future generations.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
